trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Barstow
There were no other sightings in Barstow on or around July 4th 2009
Summary: A round circle shoot south and shoot to space.
divs: Sighting DetailsA ROUND CIRCLE LIKE A PLANE LITE CAME FROM A STAR AND WENT SOUTH FOR ABOUT 2 SECONDS AND THEN SHOOT OF IN TO SPACE AND SLOWLY DISAPEARED STRAIGHT UP WE WERE SITTING ON THE PATIO AND I SUDDENLY LOOKED UP AND SEEN IT. I TOLD MY SISTER USELY PLANES GO SOUTH AND NORTH BUT THIS LIGHT WAS GOING EAST AND I TOLD MY SISTER DONT PLANES USUALLY GO NORTH AND SOUTH NOT WEST, BUT THIS LIGHT WENT WEST AND SLOWLY DISAPPEARED IN TO THE SPACE I KNOW IT WAS NOT NORMAL IT WAS NOT A PLANE, I WAS SIRPRIZES BECAUSE I ALWAYS HEARD PEOPLE TALK ABOUT SIGHTING BUT I NEVER SEEN IT FOR MY SELF BUT THIS TIME I SEEN IT FOR MY SELF. IT DISAPEARED IN TO SPACE.
